SentenceSimplified: 这个手机的拍照功能非常强大。
SentenceMeaning: The photo function of this phone is very powerful。
Synonyms:
作用 (zuò yòng) - effect
用途 (yòng tú) - usage
功能性 (gōng néng xìng) - functionality
DictionarySimplified: 物体或系统可以执行的特定任务
DictionaryMeaning: Specific tasks a device or system can perform

Synonyms:
成效 (chéng xiào) - result
作用 (zuò yòng) - effect
反应 (fǎn yìng) - response
DictionarySimplified: 由某种原因引起的实际表现
DictionaryMeaning: The actual result caused by a certain factor

SentenceSimplified: 他已经达到了自己的体能极限。
SentenceMeaning: He has already reached his physical limit。
Synonyms:
尽头 (jìn tóu) - end
界限 (jiè xiàn) - boundary
边界 (biān jiè) - border
DictionarySimplified: 事物所能达到的最大或最小程度
DictionaryMeaning: The maximum or minimum extent that something can reach

SentenceSimplified: 通过对比，我们可以看出两个方案的不同。
SentenceMeaning: Through contrast, we can see the differences between the two plans。
Synonyms:
比较 (bǐ jiào) - comparison
区别 (qū bié) - difference
差异 (chā yì) - disparity
DictionarySimplified: 把两个或多个人或事物放在一起进行比较
DictionaryMeaning: Placing two or more things together for comparison

SentenceSimplified: 他的收入在这个城市来说是相对较高的。
SentenceMeaning: His income is relatively high in this city。
Synonyms:
比较 (bǐ jiào) - comparative
相反 (xiāng fǎn) - opposite
相关 (xiāng guān) - related
DictionarySimplified: 不是绝对的，是通过比较而存在的
